description: Try our easy to follow Campari Splash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Campari Splash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir sugar and 1 cup of grapefruit juice in a pan over a medium heat until the sugar dissolves. Add 2 cups of grapefruit juice and Campari. Transfer to a container and freeze for 2 hours.
Process in a food processor until smooth, then refreeze. Process and refreeze.
Add a tablespoonful of the frozen grapefruit sorbet to tall glasses. Top up each with prosecco, sparkling wine or soda water.
